    <facet>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Fotosintesi</string>
            <string language="en">Photo synthesis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotosynthese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Synthèse de photo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Síntese da foto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθεση φωτογραφιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Síntesis de la foto</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Come possono acqua, anidride carbonica ed energia solare produrre ossigeno e zucchero?</string>
            <string language="en">Howmay water, carbon dioxide and solar energy produce oxygen and sugar?</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Howmay Wasser, Kohlendioxyd und Solarenergie 
produziert Sauerstoff und Zucker?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau de Howmay, l'anhydride carbonique et 
l'énergie solaire produisent l'oxygène et le sucre ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A água de Howmay, o dióxido de carbono e a 
energia solar produzem o oxigênio e o açúcar?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ Howmay, διοξείδιο του άνθρακα και οξυγόνο και 
σάκχαρα προϊόντων ηλιακής ενέργειας;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El agua de Howmay, el bióxido de carbono y la 
energía solar producen el oxígeno y el azúcar?</string>
          </description>
        </general>
